original_title: Ariana Grande: Sweetener Sessions (Live in London)
overview: Live show and an intimate interview by singer Ariana Grande, held in September 2018 in London. Accompanied by an all-women orchestra, Ariana sings hits like 'no tears left to cry', 'God is a woman' and 'Dangerous Woman'.
title: Ariana Grande: Sweetener Sessions (Live in London)
